fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 188.42 lakh crore compared with Rs 116.06 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 35.10 points or 0.19% to settle at 18,232.55. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 2.04% to 14.3850. RIL, Axis Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The January 2022 F&O contracts will expire on 25 January 2023.
